kodkod.engine.ucore
Class StrategyUtils

java.lang.Object
  kodkod.engine.ucore.StrategyUtils

public final class StrategyUtils
extends Object

A collection of utility methods for implementing logic-level reduction strategies.

Author:
Emina Torlak

Method Summary
static IntSet coreUnits(ResolutionTrace trace)
          Returns the set of all variables in the core of the given trace that form unit clauses.
static IntSet coreVars(ResolutionTrace trace)
          Returns relevant core variables; that is, all variables that occur both in the positive and negative phase in trace.core.

Method Detail

coreUnits

public static IntSet coreUnits(ResolutionTrace trace)
Returns the set of all variables in the core of the given trace that form unit clauses.

Returns:
{ v: [1..) | some c: trace.core | c.size() = 1 and c.maxVariable() = v }

coreVars

public static IntSet coreVars(ResolutionTrace trace)
Returns relevant core variables; that is, all variables that occur both in the positive and negative phase in trace.core.

Returns:
{ v: [1..) | (some p, n: trace.core | v in trace.elts[p].literals and -v in trace.elts[n].literals) }

rootVars

public static IntSet rootVars(TranslationLog log)
Returns the variables that correspond to the roots of log.formula.

Returns:
 
 { v: int | some r: log.records | 
   r.node in log.roots() and 
   r.env.isEmpty() and
   abs(r.literal) != Integer.MAX_VALUE and
   v = abs(r.literal) and
   no r': log.records | r'.node = r.node && log.replay.r' > log.replay.r }
